entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
